description: Your longest rides call for the most comfortable biking gear. Smartwool's new Men's Merino Sport 150 Mountain Biking Short Sleeve Tee is made with our fan-favorite fabric, which combines the sweat management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance of Merino wool with the durability and quick dry time of polyester. This tee was even designed with a longer back hem for additional coverage while biking on or off trail. Ride on—comfortably.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 - Mountain Biking SS Tee - Mens
